key.name: default-layout
key.description: The default shell layout to use when panels are created or resetted.

key.name: panel-uids
key.description: A list of panel UIDs. Each UID identifies an unique panel.

key.name: applet-uids
key.description: A list of applet UIDs. Each UID identifies an unique applet.

key.name: enable-personality-mode
key.description: Switch between normal mode and personality mode.

key.name: disable-lock-screen
key.description: Prevent the user from locking the screen.

key.name: disable-user-switching
key.description: Prevent the user from switching to another account while his session is active.

key.name: disable-log-out
key.description: Prevent the user from loging out session.

key.name: disable-suspend
key.description: Prevent the user from suspend the system.

key.name: disable-hibernate
key.description: Prevent the user from hibernate the system.

key.name: disable-reboot
key.description: Prevent the user from reboot the system.

key.name: disable-shutdown
key.description: Prevent the user from shutdown the system.
